text: Michael "Elvis" Baskette is an American music producer who has worked with Alter Bridge (Blackbird, AB III, Fortress, The Last Hero and Walk the Sky), Tremonti (All I Was, Cauterize, Dust and A Dying Machine), Chevelle (Vena Sera, This Type of Thinking (Could Do Us In)), Falling in Reverse (The Drug in Me Is You, Fashionably Late, Just Like You, Coming Home), The Classic Crime (Phoenix, Vagabonds, The Silver Cord, Albatross) Slash (World on Fire, Living the Dream). ==Selected discography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !!Band !!Album |- | style="text-align:center"
